name: Replica (itch)
description:
** Winner of Impact Award at IndieCade 2016, Honorable Mention for Excellence in Design from Independent Games Festival(IGF) 2017, Grand Prix Award at Taipei Game Show 2017, Excellence in Narrative Award at BIC Festival 2016, Best of Narrative Award & Best of Game Design Award at Indie Stream Fes 2016 **

Descriptions

Replica is an interactive novel game played through a cellphone and social media.

You are given a cellphone of an unknown owner. You must look for evidence of terrorism by hacking into the cellphone owner's account, under governmental coercion. Then inspecting the cellphone usage history and social media activity records.



The insane experience of peeping into someone's private life through a cellphone will transform you into the state's greatest patriot.


Features

  • 12 Multiple Endings
  • 8 Achievements
    • Find the activation button for the terror attack.
    • They are all on the same team.
    • Speed up.
    • Leak the secret.
    • Help Dickey to spend the rest of his life locked up.
    • Resist with all your might.
    • Stick to breaking the password.
    • Door 430
  • Languages : English, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, Turkish, Polish, Korean, Russian, German, French, Brazilian Portuguese Supported
All purchases include a DRM Free version + Steam key!
